entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2 except plus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
